00034 #ifndef __DEBUG_H_
00035 #define __DEBUG_H_
00036 
00037 #ifdef ENABLE_DEBUG
00038 
00045 #define ASSERT(exp, mesg) \
00046     if (!(exp)) \
00047     {                                                         \
00048         ClearScreen();                                        \
00049         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Critical assertion failed:");  \
00050         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE2, mesg);                          \
00051         Wait(5000);                                           \
00052         StopAllTasks();                                       \
00053     }
00054 
00060 #define WARNING(exp, mesg) \
00061     if (!(exp))                                              \
00062     {                                                        \
00063         ClearScreen();                                       \
00064         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Warning assertion failed:");  \
00065         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE2, mesg);                         \
00066     }
00067 #else
00068   #define ASSERT(x, mesg)
00069   #define WARNING(x, mesg)
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00073 
00080 #define TEST(exp, mesg) \
00081     if (!(exp))                                              \
00082     {                                                        \
00083         ClearScreen();                                       \
00084         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Test failed:");               \
00085         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE2, mesg);                         \
00086         Wait(5000);                                          \
00087         StopAllTasks();                                      \
00088     }
00089 #else
00090   #define TEST(x, mesg)
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 void TestDebug()
00094 {
00095     ASSERT(1==2, "1 is not equal to 2");
00096     WARNING(1==2, "1 is not equal to 2");
00097     TEST(1==2, "1 is not equal to 2");
00098 }
00099 
00100 #endif
